name: ΔUDIOCHROMΔ
description:
ΔUDIOCHROMΔ is a first-person music visualizer. Put your music in the Songs folder (.ogg format because patents), and explore a colorful pastel world of platonic solids constructed based on your music.

Also features a "Party Mode", which automatically shuffles through all the songs in the Songs folder, to allow you to use ΔUDIOCHROMΔ as background visualizations at a party.

What works best with this visualizer?

Electronic music works best, especially stuff with a bassy, consistent beat. Some examples of artists that have worked well in my testing:

  • Justice
  • Porter Robinson and Madeon
  • Boards of Canada
  • Animal Collective
  • Purity Ring

Obviously I can't distribute any copyrighted music with this thing, so you'll have to provide your own.

Made by @lycaontalks for #selfcarejam
